backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file listing optional API keys and Nutritionix/API Ninjas config values.
frontend/CLEAN_REDEPLOY.md: Guide describing steps to perform a clean rebuild and redeploy of the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/CSS variables and dark-theme styling definitions with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Manual regression testing checklist covering layout, navigation, widgets, and core features.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Shell script that deletes build artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, runs checks, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component that gates access via onboarding and renders pages with bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar component with five tabs and active-page highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LiveCalendarWidg: Widget showing a live-updating clock, date, and greeting using stored userName.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingGate.t: Interactive onboarding form that collects user name and multiple API keys, validates them, saves to Zustand, and completes onboarding.
frontend/src/components/OpenFoodFactsKey: Empty or placeholder file with no content provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder export noting that no backend queries are used due to local state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, custom utilities, and layout components for the app.
frontend/src/lib/apiKey.ts: Retrieves the DeepSeek API key from Zustand or environment variables.
frontend/src/lib/calories.ts: Calculates calories burned for gym and cardio using external API, DeepSeek AI, or fallback MET formulas.
frontend/src/lib/caloriesBurnedApi.ts: Calls an external calories-burned API using an API key and returns parsed calorie data or null on failure.
frontend/src/lib/caloriesBurnedKey.ts: Gets the API Ninjas key from Zustand or environment variables.
frontend/src/lib/deepseek.ts: Integrates with DeepSeek's API to fetch exercise and nutrition data and compute calorie estimates via structured prompts.
frontend/src/lib/descriptionFlow.ts: Parses free‑text food or exercise descriptions using DeepSeek AI with heuristic fallback and returns structured ParsedEntry data.
frontend/src/lib/indianNutrition.ts: Provides a small Indian nutrition database and a lookup function that returns calorie, protein, and sugar estimates based on quantity.
frontend/src/lib/mealPromptParser.ts: Extracts multiple food items from meal text by detecting quantities, units, and food keywords, converting them to gram estimates.
frontend/src/lib/mevsa.ts: Contains the Mevsa nutrition database and lookup plus predefined exercise lists for fitness categories.
frontend/src/lib/nutrition.ts: Fetches nutrition data using a multi‑tier pipeline: Nutritionix, Indian DB, Mevsa DB, then DeepSeek AI, with a simple fallback estimator.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionix.ts: Calls the Nutritionix API to fetch detailed nutrition facts for a food query, using app credentials from state or env.
frontend/src/lib/onlineNutrition.ts: Empty placeholder module for online nutrition logic.
frontend/src/lib/openFoodFactsKey.ts: Empty placeholder for OpenFoodFacts key handling.
frontend/src/lib/portionEstimates.ts: Provides default and food-specific portion-to-gram mappings and a function to estimate grams from quantity, unit, and food name.
frontend/src/lib/store.ts: Implements a Zustand store managing daily study, gym, nutrition data, user settings, and goal tracking with persistence.
frontend/src/lib/webSearchNutrition.ts: Empty placeholder module for nutrition web search logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders a dashboard showing today's study, gym, nutrition metrics, streaks, and goals using store data.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Displays daily goals with progress tracking, allowing manual updates and school attendance toggling.
frontend/src/pages/Gym.tsx: Shows gym activity summaries including calories and muscle groups, and lists today's logged activities.
frontend/src/pages/Nutrition.tsx: Displays today's nutrition metrics and lists logged food items using data from the app store.
frontend/src/pages/Study.tsx: Manages daily study topics, allowing adding, updating status, and deleting topics with dialog UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, enabled features, and planned API integrations for the app.
